1623315 THE CANTONMENTS (EXTENSION OF RENT CONTROL LAWS) ACT, 1957
ACT NO. 46 OF 1957 1 [ 18th December, 1957.]
An Act to provide for the extension to cantonments of laws relating to the control of rent and regulation of house accommodation.
627592 1 Short title.- 2
1991983 1] This Act may be called the Cantonments (Extension of Rent Control Laws) Act, 1957.
1138496 23 It shall be deemed to have come into force on the 26th day of January, 1950.]
746617 2Definition.- In this Act," cantonment" means any place declared to be cantonment under section 3 of the Cantonments Act, 1924 (2 of 1924). 178 1This Act has been extended to cantonment in the State of--
Haryana and Punjab by the East Punjab Urban Rent Restriction Act, 1949: vide Notification No. S. R. O. 7, dated 21- 11- 1969 (w. e. f. 21- 11- 1969).
Maharashtra (except Aurangabad and Kamptee) by the Bombay Rents, Hotel and lodging House Rates Control Act, 1947: vide Notification No. S. R. O. 8 (E), dated 27- 12- 1969 (w. e. f. 27- 12- 1969).
Assam by the Assam Urban Areas Rent Control Act, 1966: vide Notification No. S. R. O. 102, dated 7- 2- 1970 (w. e. f 7- 2- 1970).
Bihar by the Bihar Buildings (Lease, Rent and Eviction) Control Act, 1947: vide Notification No. S. R. O. 103, dated 7- 2- 1970 (w. e. f. 7- 2- 1970).
Tamil Nadu by the Madras Buildings (Lease and Rent Control) Act, 1960: vide Notification No. S. R. O. 104, dated 7- 2- 1970 (w. e. f. 7- 2- 1970).
Mysore by the Mysore Rent control Act, 1961: vide Notification No. S. R. O. 105, dated 7- 2- 1970 (w. e. f. 7- 2- 1970).
Kerala by the Kerala Buildings (Lease and Rent control) Act, 1965: vide Notification No. S. R. O. 106, dated 7- 2- 1970 (w. e. f. 7- 2- 1970).
Kamptee in the State of Maharashtra by the Central Provinces and Berar Regulation of Letting of Accommodation Act, 1946: vide Notifidation No. S. R. O. 2 (E), dated 28- 2- 1970 (w. e. f. 28- 2- 1970).
Ajmer by the Rajasthan Permises (Control of Rent and Eviction) Act, 1950: vide Notification No. S. R. O. 320, dated 1- 7- 1970 (w. e. f. 1- 7- 1970).
Uttar Pradesh by the United Provinces (Temporary) Control of Rent and Eviction Act, 1947: vide Notification No. S. R. O. 8 (E), dated 3- 4- 1972 (w. e. f. 3- 4- 1972).
The Act comes into force in Pondicherry vide Reg. 7 of 1963, s. 3 and Sch. I (w. e. f. 1- 10- 1963).

791338 3 Power to extend to cantonments laws relating to control of rents and regulation of house accommodation.- 1
1100325 1] The Central Government may, by notification in the Official Gazette, extend to any cantonment with such restrictions and modifications as it thinks fit, any enactment relating to the control of rent and regulation of house accommodation which is in force 2 in the State in which the cantonment is situated: Provided that nothing contained in any enactment so extended shall apply to--
817308 aany premises within the cantonment belonging to the Government;
1464008 bany tenancy or other line relationship created by a group the Government in respect of premises within the cantonment taken on lease or requisitioned by the Government; or
830214 cany house within the cantonment which is, or may be, appropriated by the Central Government on lease under the Cantonment (House Accommodation) Act, 1923 (6 of 1923)
1168593 23 The extension of any enactment under sub- section (1) may be made from such earlier or future date as the Central Government may think fit: Provided that no such extension shall be made from a date earlier than--
1756380 athe commencement of such enactment, or
1582617 bthe establishment of the cantonment, or
735768 cthe commencement of this Act, whichever is later.
210029 3Where any enactment in force in any State relating to the control of rent and regulation of house accommodation is extended to a cantonment from a date earlier than the date on which such extension is made (hereafter referred to as the" earlier date"), such enactment, as in force on such earlier date, shall apply to such cantonment, and, where any such enactment has been amended at any time after the earlier date but before the commencement of the Cantonments (Extension of Rent Control Laws) Amendment Act, 1972 (22 of 1972), such enactment, as amended, shall apply to the cantonment on and from the date on which the enactment by which such amendment was made came into force. 179 1S. 3 renumbered as sub- section (1) of that section by Act 22 of 1972, s. 3. 2. The words" on the date of the notification" omitted by s. 3, ibid. (retrospectively). 3. Ins. by s. 3, ibid.
1608001 4Where, before the extension to a cantonment of any enactment relating to the control of rent and regulation of house accommodation therein (hereafter referred to as the" Rent Control Act")--
1649647 iany decree or order for the regulation of, or for eviction from, any house accommodation in that cantonment, or
565505 iiany order in the proceedings for the execution of such decree or order, or
1709584 iiiany order relating to the control of rent or other incident of such house accommodation, was made by any court, tribunal or other authority in accordance with any law for the control of rent and regulation of house accommodation for the time being in force in the State in which such cantonment is situated, such decree or order shall, on and from the date on which the Rent Control Act is extended to that cantonment, be deemed to have been made under the corresponding provisions of the Rent Control Act, as extended to that cantonment, as if the said Rent Control Act, as so extended were in force in that cantonment, on the date on which such decree or order was made.]
